title: Saiyuuki Gaiden: Kouga no Shou
original_name: 最遊記外伝　特別編　香花の章
opening_song: "Sakura no Ki no Shita (桜の樹の下)" by KOKIA
ending_song: Hikari no Hou e (光の方へ)" by KOKIA
sinopse: Based on chapters 11-13 of the original manga with additional content written by the manga author. The story will be told from Tenpou's point of view.
